images.copyright: Lioness in Maasai Mara National Reserve, Kenya (© Tandem Stock/Adobe Stock)
images.title: Roar for a cause
images.caption: World Lion Day
images.desc: With a roar that echoes across the plains, lions have long captured the human imagination. On August 10, World Lion Day invites us to celebrate these iconic big cats while raising awareness about their declining numbers and the urgent need for conservation.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
